ğŸ”¹ Starting the Game Each player begins with a hidden fleet of ships placed on a grid.
Ships can be of varying lengths and are positioned before the match begins.
ğŸ¯ Objective Be the first to completely destroy your opponentâ€™s fleet by choosing smart attacks or strategic defenses.

âš”ï¸ Attack Select a tile on your opponentâ€™s grid to launch an attack.
If a ship occupies the tile, it takes damage.
If no ship is present, the attack misses.
Damaged ships remain in place but can no longer be moved.

ğŸ›¡ï¸ Fortify (Defend) Instead of attacking, reposition any undamaged ship on your grid.
Use this to avoid predicted attacks or strengthen your defense.
Only undamaged ships can be moved. Once a ship is hit, itâ€™s locked in place. `

ğŸ Victory Condition The game continues until one player entire fleet is destroyed.
The player with remaining ships is declared the winner.
ğŸ’¡ Tips Balance aggression with defense â€“ sometimes itâ€™s better to move than attack. Pay attention to enemy patterns and protect your high-value ships.
